data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 3, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 7, Masaaki Iemoto signals a Shimizu throw-in in Sendai's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Shimizu in Sendai.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 10, Shimizu to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Sendai pushes forward through Takuma Hamasaki, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 16, Sendai have a goal kick.
Free kick Shimizu.
Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 20, At Yurtec Stadium, Sendai are penalized for being offside.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a throw-in for Shimizu, close to Sendai's area.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 24, Takuma Nishimura of Sendai smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sendai needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
Sendai will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Shimizu.
In the minute 31, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 35, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sendai are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 38, Shimizu are coming forward and Shota Kaneko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Masaaki Iemoto awards Sendai a goal kick.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 40, Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Masaaki Iemoto awards Shimizu a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Can Sendai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
Goal kick for Shimizu at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Sendai.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In the minute 45, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Yurtec Stadium.
Sendai's Takuma Hamasaki misses with an attempt on goal.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Sendai.
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
In the minute 49, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, Sendai have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Shimizu at Yurtec Stadium.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 55, Masaaki Iemoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Sendai.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 59, Takuma Hamasaki (Sendai) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team have replaced Ryo Takeuchi with Keita Nakamura. This is the first substitution made today by Peter Cklamovski.
Shimizu make their second substitution with Teerasil Dangda replacing Kenta Nishizawa.
In the minute 60, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Shimizu's area.
Masaaki Iemoto awards Shimizu a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a first substitution, with Ryohei Michibuchi replacing Takumi Mase.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Sendai.
Free kick in a good position for Sendai!
In the minute 64, Masaaki Iemoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Sendai.
Sendai's Jakub Slowik misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Shimizu at Yurtec Stadium.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Yuito Suzuki is replacing Yusuke Goto for the away team.
The away team replace Shota Kaneko with Riyo Kawamoto.
Takashi Kiyama is making the team's second substitution at Yurtec Stadium with Shuhei Akasaki replacing Shun Nagasawa.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ryo Okui is replacing Takashi Kanai for Shimizu at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Sendai.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
At Yurtec Stadium, Takahiro Yanagi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a Sendai throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Shimizu at Yurtec Stadium.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Sendai.
Renato Augusto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shimizu.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In the minute 82, Takashi Kiyama is making the team's third substitution at Yurtec Stadium with Takayoshi Ishihara replacing Takuma Nishimura.
Throw-in Sendai.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in Sendai.
Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 88, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Masaaki Iemoto awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Sendai.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a Shimizu throw-in in Sendai's half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
Yuito Suzuki (Shimizu) has received a first yellow card.
